groups.name: thinker.cloud.async.task
groups.description: Configuration properties for asynchronous task execution.

properties.name: thinker.cloud.async.task.core-pool-size
properties.description: The core number of threads for the asynchronous task thread pool.

properties.name: thinker.cloud.async.task.max-pool-size
properties.description: The maximum number of threads for the asynchronous task thread pool.

properties.name: thinker.cloud.async.task.queue-capacity
properties.description: The maximum capacity of the task queue for the thread pool.

properties.name: thinker.cloud.async.task.keep-alive-seconds
properties.description: The time in seconds that threads should remain idle before being terminated.

properties.name: thinker.cloud.async.task.thread-name-prefix
properties.description: The prefix for thread names in the asynchronous task thread pool.

properties.name: thinker.cloud.rest-template.max-total
properties.description: The maximum total number of connections for the RestTemplate.

properties.name: thinker.cloud.rest-template.max-per-route
properties.description: The maximum number of concurrent connections per route.

properties.name: thinker.cloud.rest-template.read-timeout
properties.description: The socket read timeout in milliseconds.

properties.name: thinker.cloud.rest-template.connection-request-timeout
properties.description: The timeout in milliseconds to wait for a connection from the connection manager.
